title: TDR | End-to-End Duty Refund Solutions for eCommerce Shippers
description: Simplify global eCommerce with Trade Duty Refund's comprehensive duty and tax recovery services. Reclaim import duties on US and European returns, optimize your supply chain, and boost profitability effortlessly.
subtitle: TDR for eCom Shippers
header: End-to-End Duty Refund Solution for eCom Shippers
sub-header: Unlock hidden savings in your eCommerce supply chain with our specialized duty and tax recovery services.
integration-title: We Integrate and Add Value to Your Supply Chain
step1-description: The order has left the warehouse to its international buyer.
step2-description: The order was delivered to its US or European buyer. One or more items are returned.
step2-cta-prefix: Claim back US or Europe duties with our innovative
step3-description: The order is now back, ready to be processed at the returns warehouse.
discovery-title: Discover What's In It For eCom Shippers
